resources.string:
1. Features of App : 

 2. Before going out : 
 	 -> Switch ON your Geolocation. 
 	 -> Take pepper spray or knife with you. 

 3. As you install this App : 
 	 -> Run this app completely by using second device, to check all the utilities are working perfectly. 
 	 -> Add Phone numbers of your closed ones, that can really help if you are in trouble. 

 4. Have knowledge about self defence and constitutional laws made for the well being of women. 
 Thanks.
